content: I have just updated my profiles within simplifier so now I need new Publisher Documentation. Can I point the Publishing Implementation Guides to the Forge-Profile-Files?
I'm not quite sure what you are asking. How are you producing the guide?
I have not been able to producing the guide for about a year

This is the erorr I get when I use the IG Publisher tool there is a xml file in the examples folder Root directory: D:\HL7Tools\publisher\Publish (01.0344sec)
Publishing Content Failed: Error: folder D:\HL7Tools\publisher\Publish\examples not found (01.0346sec)
so this indicates a problem with the IG setup. is it open source?
